briefTitle: Assessment of the Transfer of Using Levonorgestrel Intrauterine System (LNG IUS) as a Contraceptive to Using it as Part of Hormone Replacement Therapy (HRT).

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women with intact uterus, regular menstrual cycles and no previous or current climacteric symptoms.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnancy or lactation.
* Previous pelvic infections.
* Abnormal bleeding.
* Abnormal uterine cavity.
* Uterine polyps.
* Genital cancer.
* Liver diseases.
* Alcoholism or drug abuse.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Bleeding Days
outcomeMeasures.description: Measured by using Subject Diaries (Subject Reported Data)

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Spotting Days
outcomeMeasures.description: Measured by using Subject Diaries (Subject Reported Data)

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Successful Treatment
outcomeMeasures.description:
Definition of successful treatment:

* Completion of HRT phase, and
* Both, the number of bleeding days and the number of spotting days during HRT was equal to or less than during contraceptive phase, and
* The number of bleeding days and the number of spotting days could be calculated for at least 3 out of the first 4 reference periods in HRT

outcomeMeasures.title: Assessment of QOL as Measured by Women's Health Questionnaire
outcomeMeasures.description: Women's Health Questionnaire (Total Score). For the Total score, the minimum is 36 and maximum is 144. A higher score means the distress and dysfunction are less pronounced.

outcomeMeasures.title: Continuation Rates
outcomeMeasures.description: Percentage of subjects continuing in the study at the given time points.

outcomeMeasures.title: Progestogenic Symptom 1: Headache (as Measured by a Visual Analogue Scale (VAS))
outcomeMeasures.description: Higher value means the symptom is more pronounced. Minimum is 0, maximum is 100.
